attributes.title: Working For Excellence Only Makes You Successful! Planning for Success Only Leads To Failure
attributes.description:
20 MAY 2020 

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA

*WORKING FOR SUCCESS, PLANNING FOR SUCCESS ALWAYS LEADS TO FAILURE. WORKING FOR EXCELLENCE ALWAYS MAKES YOU SUCCESSFUL. 

*PERSON WHO WORKS FOR SUCCESS WILL BE VERY SHALLOW. HE WILL BE WORKING DEPENDING ON OTHERS’ OPINION ABOUT HIM. ALL HIS IDEAS OF SUCCESS WILL BE DERIVED FROM OTHERS, SUSTAINED BY OTHERS, HINGED BY OTHERS. WHEREAS EXCELLENCE IS, SUPPORTED BY YOU, SUBSTANTIATED BY YOU AND MANIFESTED BY YOU.

*EXCELLENCE IS INTEGRITY-BASED, REALITY-BASED, PRESENT MOMENT-BASED. SUCCESS IS OTHERS’ OPINION-BASED. 

*PERSON WHO LIVES WITH ALL THE TIME STRATEGIZING CUNNINGLY, WORKS FOR SUCCESS. PERSON WHO EVOLVES WITH INTENSITY, LIVES WITH EXCITEMENT. 

*EXCITEMENT MANIFESTS EVERYTHING, BREAKING ALL THE LIFE-NEGATIVE PATTERNS. EVEN IN YOUR SLEEP, YOU KNOW HOW TO BE IN TUNE WITH PARAMASHIVA AND MANIFEST THE STATE, SPACE, POWERS, BEING,  SUPERCONSCIOUS AND KAILASA OF PARAMASHIVA.

*EXCELLENCE IS ALL ABOUT FROM WHERE YOU ARE RAISING YOURSELF TO THE NEXT LEVEL. SUCCESS IS ALL ABOUT OTHERS AND HOW THINGS GO WITH OTHERS. 

*WITH THE IDEA OF SUCCESS, YOU WILL ALWAYS BE WAVERING, DELUDING YOURSELF. WITH THE IDEA OF EXCITEMENT, YOU  WILL ALWAYS BE GROUNDED.

*THE EARLIEST PHOTOGRAPH AND VIDEOGRAPH AVAILABLE OF ME CONDUCTING ANY PUBLIC EVENT OR MY ENRICHING ACTIVITIES IF YOU SEE, THE FIRST PHOTOGRAPH IS OF ME DOING GANESH CHATURTI WHEN I WAS 10 OR 12. AND NEXT WE HAVE IS OF ME DOING CHANDI HOMA IN TIRUVANNAMALAI AND KAVUNTHAPADI. 

*IF YOU SEE THOSE PHOTOGRAPHS IN A DETAILED WAY, WHETHER  IT IS THE SIDE TABLE COVERED WITH CLEAN WHITE CLOTH OR MY HANDKERCHIEF, EVERYTHING NEEDED FOR THE SACRED RITUALS, THE WAY IT IS ARRANGED WILL BE THE SAME LIKE TODAY! AND IN THOSE DAYS I DID NOT HAVE EVEN ONE ASSISTANT. YOU CAN SEE THE KEY OF THE ROOM WHERE I WAS STAYING IN MY HIP! I DID NOT HAVE A SECOND PERSON WITH ME IN THE ROOM TO GIVE IT TO! I DON'T HAVE ANY PERSONAL PROPERTY IN THE ROOM. I LOCKED THE ROOM BECAUSE IT HAS PUBLIC PROPERTY - THE PUJA ITEMS, NAIVEDYAMS FOR THAT HOMA WHICH WERE KEPT IN THAT ROOM AND THE KEY IS IN MY HIP IN THOSE PHOTOGRAPHS!

*IF YOU SEE IN THOSE PHOTOGRAPHS, FROM THE TIME I STARTED MY LIFE UNTIL NOW, IT IS ALL ABOUT EXCELLENCE. IF I ORGANIZE CHANDI HOMA TODAY IN OUR ASHRAM, THERE WILL BE NOTHING DIFFERENT FROM WHAT I DID IN TIRUVANNAMALAI AND KAVUNTHAPADI. YOU CAN SEE EVERYTHING… THE COW DUNG, ON THAT THE NEW FRESH MUD POT, FRESH GHEE, SURUKKU SURVA. MAYBE WE HAVE EVERYTHING IN SILVER NOW BUT IN THOSE DAYS IT WAS ALL WOOD AND MUD. OTHER THAN THAT, EVERYTHING - WHETHER IT IS MUD OR SILVER, IS THE SAME! I WAS NOT BOTHERED ABOUT THE OUTER SUCCESS. IT WAS ALL ABOUT INNER EXCELLENCE. 

*IF YOU SEE THE HOMA NOW IN BENGALURU BIDADI, THE HOMA THAT IS HAPPENING, AND HOW I DID IN 2000 IN TVM OR KAVUNTHAPADI, YOU CAN SEE VERY CLEARLY WHAT I AM SAYING.  

*PEOPLE WHO LOOK WITH EYES OF SUCCESS WILL SAY, ‘WOW! THAT TIME, MUD POT, NOW, SILVER POT. IF YOU SEE WITH THE EYES OF EXCELLENCE THE INTENSITY IS SAME! 

*I ALWAYS WORK FOR EXCELLENCE. MUD POT BECOMES SILVER POT MAYBE THE SIDE EFFECT OF MY EXCELLENCE. BUT I DON'T CONSIDER THAT AS THE SUCCESS. AND I DON'T CONSIDER ANYTHING AS SUCCESS. TOMORROW ITSELF THE SILVER MAY BECOME GOLD POT BUT I DON'T CONSIDER THAT AS SUCCESS. I CONSIDER  - THE INTENSITY WITH WHICH I CONNECT WITH DEVI AND THE POWER OF PARAMASHIVA MANIFESTING, THAT'S ALL.

*EXCELLENCE MAKES YOU EXCITED MORE AND MORE. IDEA OF SUCCESS MAKES YOU FEEL BRED TIRED EVEN IF YOU ACHIEVE SUCCESS. IF YOU DON'T ACHIEVE SUCCESS, YOU BECOME FRUSTRATED. IF YOU ACHIEVE SUCCESS, YOU BECOME TIRED AND BORED. 

*YOU CAN SEE THE PHOTOGRAPHS OF ME DOING CHANDI HOMA IN 2000, 2001 AND PHOTOGRAPHS OF ME DOING IT IN 2018 OR 2019 OR  2020, U CAN SEE THE INTENSITY SAME.

*IT WAS MUD IN 2000, MAYBE BRASS OR COPPER IN 2004-5, NOT SILVER, SOON WHO KNOWS IT MIGHT BECOME GOLD….

*I ALWAYS WORK FOR EXCELLENCE. THAT IS WHY THE SO CALLED OUTER SUCCESS HAPPENS OR NOT I NEITHER GET FRUSTRATED NOR GET TIRED OR BORED. BUT WITH EXCELLENCE YOU WILL BE INTENSELY EXCITED, GO ON FEELING THE EXCITEMENT, EXCITEMENT, EXCITEMENT.
